pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Implementation of the Diffusion Decision Model // Provides the probability density function (PDF) of the diffusion decision model (DDM; e.g., Ratcliff McKoon, 2008, doi:10.1162/neco.2008.12-06-420) with across-trial variability in the drift rate. Because the PDF of the DDM contains an infinite sum, it needs to be approximated. 'fddm' implements all published approximations (Navarro Fuss, 2009, doi:10.1016/j.jmp.2009.02.003; Gondan, Blurton, Kesselmeier, 2014, doi:10.1016/j.jmp.2014.05.002) plus new approximations. All approximations are implemented purely in 'C++' providing faster speed than existing packages.
